1.0.name: wordpress/prism-syntax-highlighter
1.0.description:
Prism is a new lightweight, extensible syntax highlighter, built with modern web standards in mind, by Lea Verou. This is a WordPress plugin to make it super simple to use Prism on your WordPress site.

Features include:

  • Easy setup (install and activate the plugin and Prism is already working)
  • Settings page with Theme chooser
  • Enable/disable Prism plugins as required (all from the settings page)

For more info on the Prism plugin see the official site.
